title: The BMC Teammachine R Gets Its Aero Efficiency Thanks to Red Bull F1 Tech
content:
BMC's latest partnership with Red Bull's F1 engineers is an aero road bike they're hoping is 'one bike to do it all'.

Read the full article at The BMC Teammachine R Gets Its Aero Efficiency Thanks to Red Bull F1 Tech on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
